name: Pollymorph
description:
Pollymorph is a single-player colour-matching puzzle game.

In this game the player controls a small ball that can be used move other balls around. When two same-coloured balls meet they disappear and the game objective is to clear the game area by pushing balls of the same colour together.

The number of balls and the complexity of the game area increases as the player progresses through the game.

releases.comments: Included on cover mount of "The One" (Mar 1994)

shot.caption: A later level. Both the number of balls and the complexity of the game area have increased
